globalwatchlist-add: Label for button to add another row for a site
globalwatchlist-api-error:
Explanation that an error occurred, which is followed by a description of the error.

Parameters:
* $1 - the site that had the error
globalwatchlist-asof: When the feed was last refreshed; $1 = timestamp
globalwatchlist-changesfeed: Label for list of sites with changes to show
globalwatchlist-changetypes: Label for options for different change types
globalwatchlist-emptyfeed: Label for list of sites with no changes to show
globalwatchlist-fetch-site-failure: Error message shown to user when API failures prevent fetching the changes to show for a site
globalwatchlist-filter-anon: Label for the anonymous edits filter
globalwatchlist-filter-bot: Label for the bot edits filter
globalwatchlist-filter-either: Option to not filter based on anonymous/bot/minor edits
globalwatchlist-filter-minor: Label for the minor edits filter
globalwatchlist-filter-not-anon: Option to only show edits not made by anonymous users
globalwatchlist-filter-not-bot: Option to only show edits not made by bots
globalwatchlist-filter-not-minor: Option to only show edits not marked as minor
globalwatchlist-filter-only-anon: Option to only show edits made by anonymous users
globalwatchlist-filter-only-bot: Option to only show edits made by bots
globalwatchlist-filter-only-minor: Option to only show edits marked as minor
globalwatchlist-getoptions-error: Explanation when an error is detected while fetching stored user options
globalwatchlist-globalwatchlistbacklink: Label for the link to the global watchlist from the settings page
globalwatchlist-globalwatchlistlink: Label for the link to the global watchlist from the normal watchlist page
globalwatchlist-globalwatchlistsettingsl:
Label for the link to the settings page from the global watchlist
{{identical|settings}}
globalwatchlist-gotoglobal: Link text for the link from [[Special:Watchlist]] to [[Special:GlobalWatchlist]]
globalwatchlist-gotoglobal-tooltip: Tooltip for the link from [[Special:Watchlist]] to [[Special:GlobalWatchlist]]
globalwatchlist-grouped-timestamp: Tooltip for timestamp for grouped changes
globalwatchlist-history: Link text for links to page history
globalwatchlist-javascript-required: Message shown at [[Special:GlobalWatchlist]] when Javascript is not enabled
globalwatchlist-log-entry: Link text for links to individual log entries
globalwatchlist-log-page: Link text for links to log entries for a page
globalwatchlist-markseen: Button to mark a specific site as seen
globalwatchlist-markseen-all: Button to mark all sites as seen
globalwatchlist-markseen-allconfirm: Confirmation message for marking all sites as seen
globalwatchlist-must-login: Text shown to anonymous users trying to use [[Special:GlobalWatchlist]] and [[Special:GlobalWatchlistSettings]]
globalwatchlist-notify-savingfailed: Notification that settings were not saved
globalwatchlist-option-confirmallsites: Label for toggle option to opt-out of confirming before marking all sites as seen
globalwatchlist-option-fastmode: Label for toggle option to activate fast mode
globalwatchlist-option-grouppage: Label for toggle option to group results by page
globalwatchlist-option-live: Label for toggle option for live updates
globalwatchlist-otheroptions: Label for other script configuration options
globalwatchlist-prefs-settings:
Text shown to users in [[Special:Preferences]] indicating where to change global watchlist settings.

The localized names for this page are being added in the file [https://gerrit.wikimedia.org/r/plugins/gitiles/mediawiki/extensions/GlobalWatchlist/+/refs/heads/master/GlobalWatchlist.alias.php GlobalWatchlist.alias.php]. If your language is not yet there, submit a patch.
globalwatchlist-remove: Label for the button to remove a site row
globalwatchlist-resetchanges: Label for the settings button to reset changes
globalwatchlist-rewatch: Label for button to rewatch a page
globalwatchlist-save: Label for the button to save settings
globalwatchlist-settings-error-bad-sites: Error message for invalid settings; $1 = bad sites
globalwatchlist-settings-error-duplicate:
Error message for invalid settings.

Parameters:
* $1 - the site included multiple times.
globalwatchlist-settings-error-invalid-s:
Error message for invalid settings.

Parameters:
* $1 - the site that does match a wiki where the user has an attached CentralAuth account.
globalwatchlist-settings-error-too-many-:
Error message for invalid settings.

Parameters:
* $1 - the number of sites the user chose
* $2 - the maximum number of sites allowed
globalwatchlist-show-edits: Label for the option to show edits
globalwatchlist-show-logentries: Label for the option to show log entries
globalwatchlist-show-newpages: Label for the option to show new pages
globalwatchlist-sitelist: Label for user defined site list
globalwatchlist-tags:
Tags shown at the end of an entry.

Parameters:
* $1 - the number of tags, for PLURAL
* $2 - raw HTML for the tags
globalwatchlist-tour-addsite: Title for GuidedTour step describing adding more sites to the list the user includes
globalwatchlist-tour-addsite-description: Description text for GuidedTour step describing adding more sites to the list the user includes
globalwatchlist-tour-fastmode: Title for GuidedTour step describing the fast mode option
globalwatchlist-tour-fastmode-descriptio: Description text for GuidedTour step describing the fast mode option
globalwatchlist-tour-filters: Title for GuidedTour step describing filter options
globalwatchlist-tour-filters-description: Description text for GuidedTour step describing filters
globalwatchlist-tour-help: Title for GuidedTour step regarding help link
globalwatchlist-tour-help-description: Description text for GuidedTour step regarding help link
globalwatchlist-tour-sitelist: Title for GuidedTour step describing the list of sites
globalwatchlist-tour-sitelist-descriptio: Description text for GuidedTour step describing the list of sites. Feel free to change the language code en to the code for the language you're translating into.
globalwatchlist-tour-types: Title for GuidedTour step describing change types to show
globalwatchlist-tour-types-description: Description text for GuidedTour step describing change types to show
globalwatchlist-unwatch: Label for button to unwatch a page
globalwatchlist-markpageseen: Label for button to mark a page as read
prefs-globalwatchlist: Section heading text under watchlist tab in [[Special:Preferences]] for global watchlist settings
